snippet: John Tortorella wondered aloud about some of the calls at the end of the Winter Classic. And then he wondered some more.
abstract: New York Rangers coach John Tortorella, upset with the quality of refereeing at the NHL Winter Classic, suggests that referees conspired with the league to force Rangers and Philadelphia Flyers into overtime, noting supposed noncalls involving Philadelphia and what he regarded as invented penalty calls against the Rangers.
lead_paragraph: John Tortorella wondered aloud about some of the calls at the end of the Winter Classic. And then he wondered some more.

headline.seo: Rangers See Conspiracies in Winter Classic Calls
headline.main: Rangers See Conspiracies in Winter Classic Calls
